```{r, echo=FALSE, include=TRUE, results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
  as_tibble %>% 
  mutate(across(everything(), as.character)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(1:5, values_to = "value") %>% 
  left_join(tibble(name = c("EOO_mode",
                            "EOO_mode"),
                   value = c("planar",
```

```{r grid-build}
merged_data <- dplyr::left_join(
  x = params$data,
  y = params$results %>%
    tibble::as_tibble() %>% 
    dplyr::select(taxa, category), by = c(".__taxa" = "taxa")
)

merged_data_sf <- sf::st_as_sf(merged_data, coords = c(".__longitude", ".__latitude"))
sf::st_crs(merged_data_sf) <- 4326

merged_data_sf_proj <- sf::st_transform(merged_data_sf, sf::st_crs("EPSG:6933"))
poly_proj <- sf::st_transform(params$polygon_rv, sf::st_crs("EPSG:6933"))

grid <- sf::st_make_grid(
  x = poly_proj, 
  cellsize = params$resol*1000
)
grid <- st_as_sf(grid) %>% 
  mutate(id = seq_len(n()))

intersect_grid <- sf::st_intersection(merged_data_sf_proj, grid)

stats_cell1 <- intersect_grid %>% 
  sf::st_set_geometry(NULL) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(id) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(
    nbe_esp = dplyr::n_distinct(.__taxa),
    n = length(.__taxa)
  )

n_cr <- intersect_grid  %>% 
  sf::st_set_geometry(NULL) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(id, .__taxa, category) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(category == "CR") %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(id) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(n_cr = n())


n_en <- intersect_grid  %>% 
  sf::st_set_geometry(NULL) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(id, .__taxa, category) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(category == "EN") %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(id) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(n_en = n())


n_vu <- intersect_grid  %>% 
  sf::st_set_geometry(NULL) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(id, .__taxa, category) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(category == "VU") %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(id) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(n_vu = n())


grid <- grid %>% 
  dplyr::left_join(stats_cell1) %>% 
  dplyr::left_join(n_cr) %>% 
  dplyr::left_join(n_en) %>% 
  dplyr::left_join(n_vu) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(n_threatened = n_cr + n_en + n_vu) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(prop_threatened = round((n_threatened/ nbe_esp)*100, 1))

grid <- sf::st_transform(grid, 4326)
```


```{r, fig.show='asis', echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

group_lf <- c("Occurences", "Polygon", "grid")

grid_s <- grid %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(prop_threatened))

pal <- leaflet::colorNumeric(
  palette = "viridis",
  domain = grid_s$prop_threatened
)

leaf_map <- leaflet::leaflet(
  data = merged_data_sf,
  options = leaflet::leafletOptions(zoomControl = FALSE)
) %>%
  leaflet::invokeMethod(
    data = NULL,
    method = "addZoom",
    list(position = "topright")
  ) %>%
  leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$OpenStreetMap, group = "OSM") %>%
  leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$Esri.WorldImagery, group = "Esri") %>%
  leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$OpenTopoMap, group = "Open Topo Map") %>%
  leaflet::addCircleMarkers(
    popup = merged_data_sf %>%
      sf::st_drop_geometry() %>%
      # create_popup() %>%
      lapply(htmltools::HTML),
    fillOpacity = 1,
    clusterOptions = leaflet::markerClusterOptions(
      maxClusterRadius = 1,
      zoomToBoundsOnClick = FALSE
    ),
    group = "Occurences"
  ) %>%
  leaflet::addPolygons(
    # params$res_aoo,
    data = grid_s,
    fillColor = ~pal(prop_threatened),
    weight = 1,
    opacity = 1,
    color = "black",
    dashArray = "1",
    fillOpacity = 0.6,
    group = "grid", 
    label = grid_s %>% pull(prop_threatened),
    popup = leafpop::popupTable(grid_s %>% sf::st_set_geometry(NULL))
  )

if (!is.null(params$polygon_rv)) {
  center_m <- as.vector(sf::st_bbox(params$polygon_rv))
  leaf_map <- leaf_map  %>% 
    leaflet::fitBounds(
      lng1 = center_m[1],
      lng2 = center_m[3],
      lat1 = center_m[2],
      lat2 = center_m[4]
    ) %>%
    leaflet::addPolygons(
      # params$res_aoo,
      data = params$polygon_rv,
      fillColor = "blue",
      weight = 1,
      opacity = 0.1,
      color = "blue",
      dashArray = "1",
      fillOpacity = 0.1,
      group = "Polygon",
      label = "Polygon"
    )
}

leaf_map <- leaf_map %>%
  leaflet::addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("OSM", "Esri", "Open Topo Map"),
    options = leaflet::layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE),
    overlayGroups = group_lf
  )

leaf_map
```
